title: Cognitive Apprenticeship Learning Program for Developing Economic Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic economic concepts and mathematical thinking skills
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate the ability to solve real-life economic problems, conducted in a limited technological environment based on smartphones. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Ability to construct causal relationship diagrams explaining economic phenomena with over 80% accuracy
Applying metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) at least three times during economic problem-solving processes
Achieving an average performance score of 3.5/5 or higher in team-based economic simulation projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
